s0001: Fan Sui was a Wei native, styled Shu.
s0002: He wandered persuading various lords, wishing to serve Wei king, but family poor with no means to support himself, so first served Wei central grand master Xu Jia.
s0003: Xu Jia as Wei Zhao Wang envoy to Qi, Fan Sui followed.
s0004: Stayed several months, not getting response.
s0005: Qi Xiang Wang heard Sui eloquent speech, then sent people grant Sui gold ten jin and beef wine, Sui declined thanked dared not accept.
s0006: Xu Jia knew it, greatly angered, considered Sui held Wei state secret matters told Qi, thus got this gifts, commanded Sui accept their beef wine, return their gold.
s0007: After returning home, still angry with Sui, reported to Wei chancellor.
s0008: Wei chancellor, Wei various crown princes, called Wei Qi.
s0009: Wei Qi greatly angered, made retainers cane beat Sui, broke ribs knocked out teeth.
s0010: Sui feigned death, then rolled in mat, placed in latrine.
s0011: Guests drinking got drunk, moreover urinated on Sui, thus humiliated to punish later, make none dare speak rashly.
s0012: Sui from mat told guard: 'You able release me, I certainly thick thank you.'
s0013: Guard then requested throw out dead person in mat.
s0016: Later Wei Qi regretted, again summoned sought him.
s0017: Wei person Zheng Anping heard it, then led Fan Sui fled, hid, changed name surname called Zhang Lu.
s0018: At this time, Qin Zhao Wang made ye zhe Wang Ji go to Wei.
s0019: Zheng Anping falsely as soldier, served Wang Ji.
s0020: Wang Ji asked: 'Wei has worthy person can with together west wander?'
s0021: Zheng Anping said: 'Minister village has Zhang Lu master, wishes see lord, speak world affairs.
s0022: That person has enmity, dares not day see.'
s0024: Zheng Anping night with Zhang Lu saw Wang Ji.
s0025: Conversation not complete, Wang Ji knew Fan Sui worthy, told him: 'Master wait me at three pavilions south.'
s0027: Wang Ji bid farewell Wei gone, passing carried Fan Sui enter Qin.
s0028: Arrived Hu, saw carriages riders from west coming.
s0029: Fan Sui said: 'Those coming are who?'
s0030: Wang Ji said: 'Qin chancellor Rang Hou east travel counties cities.'
s0031: Fan Sui said: 'I heard Rang Hou monopolizes Qin authority, hates receives various lords guests, this fears humiliate me, I rather temporarily hide carriage middle.'
s0032: After while, Rang Hou indeed arrived, greeted Wang Ji, because standing carriage spoke: 'Guan east has what change?'
s0034: Again told Wang Ji: 'Ye zhe you not with various lords guest sons come together?
s0035: No benefit, only disrupts people state.'
s0038: Fan Sui said: 'I heard Rang Hou wise scholar, his seeing affairs slow, just now suspected carriage middle had person, forgot search it.'
s0039: Then Fan Sui alighted ran, said: 'This certainly regret it.'
s0040: Walked ten plus li, indeed made riders return search carriage middle, no guest, then stopped.
s0041: Wang Ji then with Fan Sui entered Xianyang.
s0042: Already reported envoy, because spoke: 'Wei has Zhang Lu master, world eloquent scholar.
s0043: Said Qin king state endangered like piled eggs, get minister then safe.
s0046: Qin king not believed, made lodge eat fodder straw.
s0048: At this time, Zhao Wang already established thirty six years.
s0049: South captured Chu Dang Ying, Chu Huai Wang imprisoned died in Qin.
